person.name: Cecil O. Samuelson
person.description: Elder Cecil O. Samuelson was called to serve as a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on October 1, 1994. As of May 1, 2003, he presides as president of Brigham Young University. Previously, Elder Samuelson has served as a member of the Presidency of the Seventy, and as president of the Utah North Area, second counselor in the North America West Area presidency and president of the Europe North Area.
